title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

tosdr.case: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
tosdr.tldr: The registration terms state that "If you open any links posted by a user to an external website or Internet resource, you do so at your own risk." and "We accept no liability in the event that a user clicks a link that is found to be inappropriate, dangerous, malicious, or illegal; however, we will make efforts to remove links to hateful content, pornography, content that infringes upon the copyright of another party, or illegal content if such links are discovered. "
